TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BufferedGraphicsManager extends System.Object
public ref class BufferedGraphicsManager abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi sealed BufferedGraphicsManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 提供对应用程序域的主缓冲图形上下文对象的访问。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager> 类允许您为图形实现自定义双缓冲。 使用双缓冲的图形可以减少或消除因重绘显示图面而引起的闪烁。
此类有一个 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A>的静态属性，该属性返回当前应用程序域的主 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>。 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> 类创建可用于绘制缓冲图形的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> 实例。
<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> 类没有公共构造函数，必须使用其 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> 方法为应用程序域的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> 对象创建该构造函数。 可以从静态 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性检索当前应用程序域的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> 对象。
有关双缓冲的详细信息，请参阅[双缓冲图形](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics)、<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>和 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前应用程序域的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>。
[!code-cpp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CPP/bufferingexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CS/bufferingexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/VB/bufferingexamples.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Current As BufferedGraphicsContext
public: static property System::Drawing::BufferedGraphicsContext ^ Current { System::Drawing::BufferedGraphicsContext ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取当前应用程序域的 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在应用程序中，<xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A> 属性始终返回相同的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> 对象。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取当前应用程序域的 <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>。
[!code-cpp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CPP/bufferingexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/CS/bufferingexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BufferingExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BufferingExamples/VB/bufferingexamples.vb#1)]
